settings.title: Settings

timeLimit.title: Time Limit
timeLimit.description: Set the time limit for the reminders

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: This section is for development purposes only. You can use it to delete all notifications and scheduled notifications from the database
dangerZone.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete all notifications and scheduled notifications?
dangerZone.success: All notifications and scheduled notifications have been deleted
